title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 459.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 459.1 - Application

State Regulations

Any municipality or rural electric cooperative purchasing
essentially all of its power requirements from the Power Authority of the State
of New York shall incorporate into its service rules and enforce the procedures
governing discontinuance of electric service as set forth in sections 459.2
through
459.14
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
459.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
